adrFormatAddress: 33 Fifth Avenue 1C Entrance on, E 10th St, New York, NY 10003, USA

originalText.text: Phenomenal experience from beginning to end! Liz greeted me immediately and made me feel calm and comfortable. We chatted and discussed the insurance coverage. Once in the back, Dr. Harwood explained the procedure thoroughly including showing me the x-rays. Dr. Harwood made sure my mouth was completely numb before beginning the procedure. It was painless and efficient. At the end I was shown my post op x-rays. Liz then provided me with discharge information and a number to call in case of an emergency. They are the best dental care providers. Thank you so much!

originalText.text: Dr Harwood and his assistant Liz are both amazing. I am usually very scared of the dentist and a root canal is a pretty intense procedure, but this was an amazing experience. It went by very quickly and painlessly, I honestly could not believe it when he told me he was done! I would fully recommend Dr Harwood if you need a root canal and you are nervous or scared. Shout out to Liz,  truly an angel.

originalText.text:
My experience with Dr. Hardwood and Liz is over all outstanding. I was in so much pain and they managed to squeeze me in. Liz is so caring and on top of things, Dr.Hardwood explained what was going on patiently. I had to go three times because of an insurance problem. He prescribed the right antibiotics and I could finally sleep. The root canal procedure was painless, i had several root canals and for the first time I didn’t feel anything. I was relaxed during the procedure. The review talking about feeling pain after a root canal, of course you still feel pain. Your general dentist is supposed to prescribe antibiotics until the pain is gone.

He’s the best Endodontist around! I’ve look him up no wonder he has many distinctions because of his work.

originalText.text: Dr. Harwood is very Professional & extraordinary as a Specialist for Rootcanal procedure. I have had various root canals performed by him & it was always a very good experience. He has the “velvet touch” & I never had pain afterwards! He is truly outstanding in his field of expertise. Liz, his assistant is very helpful &  courteous & truly knowledgeable in all aspects of this office. She is a great “right hand’ to Dr. Harwood’s focus on his procedures & in making the patient comfortable & gaining their trust. Many  many Thanks!

originalText.text: I had a phenomenal experience with Dr. Harwwod. From the moment I entered the office both he and his assistant Liz catered to my every need. They explained in full detail exactly what they were going to do, what pain if any I would feel (I barely felt any), and exactly how I would feel after my procedure. Shortly after my visit I received the most pleasant check up call from Liz just to see how things were going, and that was the cherry on top for me. I would highly recommend Dr Harwood for a root canal. The time & patience he took to ensure I fully understood every step of the procedure is by far the the best part of the experience & an awesome root canal with no post pain made me know that if I ever have to go back, I would return with the utmost faith that the procedure I’m receiving is being done by a quality staff of people who truly care for their patients….. Great Job Dr Harwood & Liz !!
